articles.title: Years of drought threaten South Africa's wildlife industry
articles.description: A severe drought is threatening South Africa's wildlife industry, with game farmers keeping fewer animals and tourists visiting game lodges in smaller numbers.
articles.content:
STRYDENBURG/GROBLERSHOOP, South Africa (Reuters) - A severe drought is threatening South Africa’s wildlife industry, with game farmers keeping fewer animals and tourists visiting game lodges in smaller numbers.

articles.title: Zimbabwe's CBZ bank issues bonds under scheme to raise funds for maize, soy farming
articles.description: Zimbabwe's largest bank CBZ launched two bond issues on Monday, seeking to raise $80.6 million to finance maize and soybean farming, as the country faces another drought that could worsen an already dire economic situation.
articles.content:

articles.title: Polish hospice fire kills four
